Message: The user completes the submission of the form

Hi, my campaigns keep on getting rejected and it says:

Your ad (FB2) is not running! Immediate action is required to comply with our ad policy.

Reject reason: The URL/Landing page(s) associated with your ad is currently broken. Please provide a working version.

Your partnership and cooperation in maintaining a high standard of advertising quality are highly appreciated. If you have any questions or need further assistance, just reply to this email. We’re here to help.

We eagerly anticipate receiving your revised ad for prompt reevaluation!

Related ad info:
Account: TRODLOVE LLC
Campaign N

Hi Michael, I'm sorry to hear that your campaigns are getting rejected due to broken URLs/landing pages. To resolve this issue, please ensure that the URLs/landing pages associated with your ads are working correctly and accessible. Once you have fixed the URLs, you can resubmit your ads for reevaluation. For more detailed information on what to do next after an ad rejection, please refer to this article: [My ad got rejected. What's next?](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next). If you need further assistance or have any questions, feel free to reply here or contact our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com.
